message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $12,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is an exclusive opportunity not to be missed. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in enhancing your experience.
